name: Veedia
overview: Veedia helps mobile operators, content owners, media companies, and contact centers extend products and services to a wider audience—3G mobile users—and improve mobile content uptake by providing fast and easy access to engaging interactive mobile video services.

milestones.description: Veedia Establishes Scandinavia Headquarters in Finland
milestones.source_text:
Aland Islands, Finland (June 25, 2008) - Veedia opens new distribution channel in the Nordic countries for the Veediaâ„¢ Mobile Video Solutions platform, and its Flash 3G Video Gateway.

Veedia Scandinaviaâ€™s initial focus will be on mobile advertising solutions and location based services.

Veedia Flash 3G Video Gateway provides a full Flash experience that supports any Flash Player versionâ€”this means what can be done on the Web can now be extended to any 3G or SIP device, and weâ€™re the first to offer this kind of service.

Madrid, Spain and Ã…land, Finland. â€“ 25 June 2008 â€“ Cystelcom Sistemas, a leading supplier of 3G mobile video solutions, announced the opening of Veedia Scandinavia in Ã…land, Finland. Veedia Scandinavia is a subsidiary of Veediaâ„¢ Mobile Video Solutions a Cystelcom spin-off. Its opening spearheads Cystelcomâ€™s ambitious 
plans for international distribution of Veedia Mobile Video Solutions, and the recently released Flash 3G Video Gateway.

'We selected Finland because of its optimal environment for development and acceptance of mobile technology. Finland is not only home to some of the worldâ€™s leaders in mobility like Nokia, but also houses many inventive mobile technology companies,' commented Manuel Cuenca VÃ©lez, CEO of Cystelcom Sistemas, 'and we believe Veedia will become a key supplier in the market.'

Veedia Scandinavia offers the complete Veedia Mobile Video Solutions product line, enabling a wide range of video and multimedia services. And now, with the recent addition of Veedia Flash 3G Video Gateway, 3G users can experience previously unobtainable multimedia services that offer real bi-directional video/audio communication and enabling users to interact with any Flash enabled application. 'The platform provides a full Flash experience that supports any Flash Player versionâ€”this means what can be done on the Web can now be extended to any 3G or SIP device, and weâ€™re the first to offer this kind of service,' said RaÃºl Partida, Director of Veedia Scandinavia.

Veedia Scandinaviaâ€™s initial focus is on mobile advertising solutions and location based services for operators, advertisers and brands as Finland was an early adopter of mobile advertising and there is a growing demand for more engaging video and multimedia mobile services. 'We are also very excited about the synergy we are seeing in other sectors such as entertainment, banking and health care,' added Partida.

The Veedia Mobile Video Solutions platform provides the foundation for these sought-after services allowing essentially unlimited creativity for mobile services offerings. 'From launching a real-time interactive mobile advertising campaign that captures valuable customer response data, to deploying mobile search services that allow end-users to interact with Google Map results, anything is possible with Veedia,' commented Partida.

RaÃºl Partida heads the new Scandinavia division and expects rapid growth for Veedia due to the increasing demand for innovative mobile technology solutions in the market. Over the last seven years Partida has spent his time in the telecom sector working for companies that specialize in gateway solutions and mobile content; customers included Movistar, Cable & Wireless and Telcel. Partida is not a newcomer to Scandinavia, he lives in Mariehanmn, Finland, and is the founder and CEO of Just a Key Solutionsâ€”an application development and consulting services firm.

Veediaâ„¢ Mobile Video Solutions headquarters is located in Madrid, Spain. Veedia clients include some of the leading players in the mobile ecosystem, including Vodafone, Movistar and British Telecom.

For more information, click here. 

About Veedia
Veedia Mobile Video Solutions (www.veedia.com is a video/multimedia application platform that provides real time bi-directional 3G mobile video services to 3G users and broadband IP networks. Veedia is the only platform that enables mobile operators, content owners, media companies and contact centers to extend location-based services, mapping and directory services to any 3G handset using the video call feature. Veedia powers solutions across many industries and domains from entertainment and social networking to advertising, health care and contact centers. Our clients include some of the leading players in the mobile ecosystem, including Vodafone, Movistar and British Telecom. Veedia is headquartered in Madrid, Spain. Veedia is spin-off of Cystelcom.

About CYSTELCOM
Founded in 1993, Cystelcom is a leading provider of intelligent communications solutions for multi-channel contact centers and 3G telephony. As an industry innovator, Cystelcom provides standalone and integrated back-office, contact center and video contact center solutions that optimize communication, increase business efficiency, reduce costs and increase customer satisfaction. Cystelcom delivers revenue-generating, cutting-edge solutions and services that meet the needs of mobile operators, content providers and contact centers.

Cystelcom solutions are built on unique, open technologies and leverage strategic relationships with telecom operators, value-added technology providers and system integrators. Cystelcom is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.
milestones.source_description: Veedia Sets its Sights on Scandinavia and Opens Office in Finland
